plugin-data.name: Matomo Analytics
plugin-data.description: This plugin appends the Matomo tracking code to the head part of the site.

complete-this-field-with-the-matomo-serv: Complete this field with Matomo's server Full Qualified Domain Name, e.g. matomo.myserver.com
complete-this-field-with-the-matomo-site: Complete this field with the tracked site ID (look for it in Matomo's tracking code on the line _paq.push(['setSiteId', 'id#']);)
